to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: Re: Hello all!
body:
Keith Hinton wrote:
> Does anyone know if the CVS snapshots on the freesoft.org site are current? 
> For example, the link where it says "Latest CVS snapshot" for either 
> Speech-Dispatcher, or SpeechD-up?

Hi Keith, the links generate the latest CVS snapshot on the fly, so the 
answer is yes, they are current.

Best regards

Tomas
